text: Nguyễn Hữu Thọ (10 July 1910 – 24 December 1996) was a Vietnamese revolutionary and Chairman of Consultative Council of the National Liberation Front of South Vietnam from 6 June 1969 to 2 July 1976, and the Chairman of the National Assembly of Vietnam from 4 July 1981 to 18 June 1987. ==Other websites== *Interview with Nguyễn Hữu Thọ, 1981 (Video Interview) WGBH Media Library & Archives Category:1910 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Presidents of Vietnam Category:Vice presidents of Vietnam
title: Nguyễn Hữu Thọ
